text: Raj Kumar (born 15 December 1959) is a professor of neurosurgery. He was a founding director of All India Institute of Medical Sciences, Rishikesh and former vice-chancellor of Uttar Pradesh University of Medical Sciences. == References == == Other Website == *Official website Category:Living people Category:Neurosurgeons Category:Indian physicians Category:People from Uttar Pradesh Category:1959 births
title: Raj Kumar (professor)
